mapper.insert: insert into db_forumtopic (SEQUENCEID, STYPE, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, FORUMID, PARENTID, CLICKCOUNT, ANSWERCOUNT, ANSWEROPER, ANSWERTIME, HOTFLAG, PICURL, IPADDRESS, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, TOPICNAME, CONTENT) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{forumid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{answercount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{answeroper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hotflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topicname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_forumtopic set STYPE = #{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FORUMID = #{forumid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLICKCOUNT = #{clickcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ANSWERCOUNT = #{answercount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ANSWEROPER = #{answeroper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANSWERTIME = #{answertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HOTFLAG = #{hotflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICURL = #{picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IPADDRESS = #{ipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOPICNAME = #{topicname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, STYPE, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, FORUMID, PARENTID, CLICKCOUNT, ANSWERCOUNT, ANSWEROPER, ANSWERTIME, HOTFLAG, PICURL, IPADDRESS, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, TOPICNAME, CONTENT from db_forumtopic where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, STYPE, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, FORUMID, PARENTID, CLICKCOUNT, ANSWERCOUNT, ANSWEROPER, ANSWERTIME, HOTFLAG, PICURL, IPADDRESS, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, TOPICNAME, CONTENT from db_forumtopic
